page.title: 05HOUSING IN OTTERY
page.content: room, with toilet, washbasin and bath, and three bedrooms. We have had the garage changed into a sitting room and the old sitting room is a bedroom. Our house isn't in a very big estate. I don't think, some of our frames are wood well, only the ones in conservatory and sitting room are aluminuim. We have got 8 windows donstairs and 4 upstairs. In between our garden and the garden next door we have got some shrubs. I have got quite a big front garden and the back is a bit larger. I have got a drive that slopes down but it is is not very steep.
